name: Super Boys
description:
You can optionally add additional accessories to your characters and make them look even better, of course, it's your choice :)

Since the game is in beta, the game time is 10 minutes for now, but soon we will release the full version and serve you, we will announce the developments about the game on our twitter account.

Follow our Twitter address because we will open a discord server for our game soon so we can get your feedback
Twitter = https://twitter.com/BoysDevelopment
Youtube = https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCW7-...
Discord = https://discord.gg/VuG5sa5ZnG
